languages.text: "Наоборот — сконцентрируем на себе весь огонь. Разделение дает тактические преимущества, я это знаю по десяткам успешных штурмов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Отвернувшийся было Антар медленно поворачивается к вам. Несколько мгновений вы наблюдаете за игрой бликов на его шлеме, затем раздается сухое:{/n} "Нет".

languages.text: "No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."
languages.original_text: "Наоборот — сконцентрируем на себе весь огонь. Разделение дает тактические преимущества, я это знаю по десяткам успешных штурмов".

traits.locale_text: "No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."
"No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."
"No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."
"No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."
"No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."

languages.text: «No, centraremos sus ataques sobre nosotros. Dividirnos nos confiere ventajas tácticas; lo confirma mi experiencia en una veintena de asaltos con éxito».
languages.original_text: "No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."

traits.locale_text: «No, centraremos sus ataques sobre nosotros. Dividirnos nos confiere ventajas tácticas; lo confirma mi experiencia en una veintena de asaltos con éxito».

languages.text: “不行，我们得吸引他们的火力，让他们专心攻击我们。分头行动可以带来战术优势，这是我从几十次顺利行动中总结出来的经验。”
languages.original_text: "No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."

traits.locale_text: “不行，我们得吸引他们的火力，让他们专心攻击我们。分头行动可以带来战术优势，这是我从几十次顺利行动中总结出来的经验。”

languages.text: « Non, mieux vaut concentrer tous leurs tirs sur un seul groupe. En opérant séparément, nous gagnerons un avantage tactique. C'est une stratégie qui a déjà fait ses preuves à maintes reprises. »
languages.original_text: "No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."

traits.locale_text: « Non, mieux vaut concentrer tous leurs tirs sur un seul groupe. En opérant séparément, nous gagnerons un avantage tactique. C'est une stratégie qui a déjà fait ses preuves à maintes reprises. »

languages.text: 「だめです。私たちが彼らの攻撃をすべて引きつけます。分かれて行動することで戦術的な利があります。これは成功した幾多の襲撃から得た経験です」
languages.original_text: "No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."

traits.locale_text: 「だめです。私たちが彼らの攻撃をすべて引きつけます。分かれて行動することで戦術的な利があります。これは成功した幾多の襲撃から得た経験です」

languages.text: "Hayır, tüm ateş güçleri bizim üzerime yoğunlaşacak. Ayrılmamız bize taktiksel avantaj sağlayacak. Bunu onlarca başarılı taarruzdan biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, tüm ateş güçleri bizim üzerime yoğunlaşacak. Ayrılmamız bize taktiksel avantaj sağlayacak. Bunu onlarca başarılı taarruzdan biliyorum."

languages.text: "Nein, dadurch würden wir den gesamten Beschuss auf uns ziehen. Wenn wir uns aufteilen, haben wir einen taktischen Vorteil ... das weiß ich nach Dutzenden erfolgreicher Angriffe."
languages.original_text: "No, we will focus all their fire on us. Splitting up grants us tactical advantages — I know this based on dozens of successful assaults."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, dadurch würden wir den gesamten Beschuss auf uns ziehen. Wenn wir uns aufteilen, haben wir einen taktischen Vorteil ... das weiß ich nach Dutzenden erfolgreicher Angriffe."
